title: 6 years of commit visualized
description: Today I was curious about plotting all the Redis commits we have on Git, which are 90% of all the Redis commits. There was just an initial period where I used SVN but switched very soon.

title: Testing with Data
description: It’s not a coincidence that this is coming off the heels of Dave Paquette’s post on GenFu and Simon Timms’ post on source control for databases in the same way it was probably not a coincidence that Hollywood released three …
